description:
In 2016 a meltdown of a nuclear power plant creates a big catastrophe in Tokyo. 20 years later, the city has become a ghost town due to the high levels of radiation. From that area a distress signal is received. The Self Defence forces dispatch 3 girls from the special unit Coppelion to search for survivors. But why aren't they wearing any protection against radiation?

(Source: Manga synopsis)

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Pandemic
tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

node.description: angela is a Japanese pop band. The main members are Yamashita Atsuko (artist name "atsuko") and Hirasato Katsunori (artist name "KATSU").

Shingo Suzuki is an animator previously belonging to Gonzo and Satelight and now affiliated with GoHands.  He was being influenced by Masami Obari and Fumihide Sai and is particularly known for his bold and peculiar shading and high level drawings.
__Kudou Susumu__ is a director and storyboard artist.

__Alma mater:__ Osaka University of Arts

Hiromitsu Kanazawa is a director formerly belonging to Satelight, now affiliated with GoHands.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E6%A9%8B%E7%A7%80%E9%9B%84_(%E9%9F%B3%E9%9F%BF%E7%9B%A3%E7%9D%A3%29)

Hideo Takahashi is a sound director.

__Alma mater:__ Osaka University of Arts

Hiromitsu Kanazawa is a director formerly belonging to Satelight, now affiliated with GoHands.

Affiliated with [GoHands](https://anilist.co/studio/309/).

Often miscredited as Makoto Yoshida (吉田誠).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sna72860) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/中村誠_(脚本家%29)

Affiliated with [Frontier Works](https://anilist.co/studio/61/).

Initially he was mainly a scriptwriter for radio programs, but ever since his involvement on [Kanon](https://anilist.co/anime/144/) in 2002, he has been working on animation-related projects as both scriptwriter and producer.

In 2010, he made his directorial debut with the puppet animation [Cheburashka](https://anilist.co/anime/9340/).

_Note: Not to be confused with [either](https://anilist.co/staff/134789/) of [the two](https://anilist.co/staff/265458/) animators._

Shingo Suzuki is an animator previously belonging to Gonzo and Satelight and now affiliated with GoHands.  He was being influenced by Masami Obari and Fumihide Sai and is particularly known for his bold and peculiar shading and high level drawings.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sna72860) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/中村誠_(脚本家%29)

Affiliated with [Frontier Works](https://anilist.co/studio/61/).

Initially he was mainly a scriptwriter for radio programs, but ever since his involvement on [Kanon](https://anilist.co/anime/144/) in 2002, he has been working on animation-related projects as both scriptwriter and producer.

In 2010, he made his directorial debut with the puppet animation [Cheburashka](https://anilist.co/anime/9340/).

_Note: Not to be confused with [either](https://anilist.co/staff/134789/) of [the two](https://anilist.co/staff/265458/) animators._
_Note: Not to be confused with either the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/218342/) or the [painter](https://anilist.co/staff/149497/) by the same name._

Affiliated with [GoHands](https://anilist.co/studio/309/).

Often miscredited as Makoto Yoshida (吉田誠).
